brief: Creates new sprites that will be show in your game

full.info: Creates new sprites that will be show in your game

Sprite.info: Called when the new sprite object has been created

Error.info: Output for when an error has occured creating the sprite

create.info: Message that will create the sprite
create.expects:
expects IIP.required.parent to be set.
Also expects IIP.optional.assetPath or IIP.optional.assetKey to be set.
If the assetKey is set then the AssetManager system will be used.
If the path is set then the raw data path will be used
